articles.title: Kraken Operator Bit Trade Fined $5.2M in 'Significant Outcome' for Crypto Enforcement
articles.description: The Australian operator of the Kraken crypto exchange has been fined $5.2 million by ASIC for illegally issuing credit to over 1,100 customers.
articles.content:

articles.title: Crypto: AMP buys $27 million in bitcoin in the first foray of big superannuation funds into the asset class
articles.description: The fund says the $27 million it is investing in bitcoin is part of its diversification strategy; critics say the asset class had no place in retirement portfolios.
